summary: Contoso Wireless offers a variety of upgrade services, including product streaming which allows customers to access a library of streaming products and services, such as music, movies, and TV shows. There is a monthly fee associated with the service, and customers can choose from basic, premium, and ultra-premium plans. Benefits include exclusive content and discounts on select products and services, automatic updates, and 24/7 customer support. Security is taken seriously with advanced encryption technology and strict privacy policies in place. Customers can cancel their subscription at any time without penalty.
